Introduction
Vasyl Tkach currently works at the Department of Biology, University of North Dakota. Vasyl does research in Zoology, Systematics (Taxonomy) and Evolutionary Biology.

Species diversity, systematics and phylogeny of cestodes of the family Hymenolepididae (Eucestoda, Cyclophyllidea) from small mammals from Northern Asia
Project
The species richness of the family Hymenolepididae from rodents and insectivorous and the taxonomic structure of this group of cestodes remain poorly studied. At the same time, the comprehensive studies of the fauna of Hymenolepididae from small mammals in Northern Asia have not been carried out to the date. The project is aimed at solving the problems of taxonomy, phylogeny and geographical distribution of cestodes of the family Hymenolepididae from small mammals (rodents and insectivores) from Siberia, the Far East and adjacent territories.
